H0.text: Which celebrated battle was fought near Brno on 2nd December 1805. Borodino

H1.text: Which celebrated battle was fought near Brno on 2nd December 1805. Waterloo

H2.text: Which celebrated battle was fought near Brno on 2nd December 1805. Leipzig

H3.text: Which celebrated battle was fought near Brno on 2nd December 1805. Austerlitz

A4.text: The Battle of Austerlitz (2 December 1805/11 Frimaire An XIV FRC)

A5.text: The battle took place about six miles (ten kilometres) southeast of the city of Brno, between that city and Austerlitz (Czech: Slavkov u Brna) in what is now the Czech Republic.
